Team

About us

We are a group of passionate PhD scholars with a deep love for chemistry. Each year, we organize an Intra-Departmental Chemistry symposium called 'ChemSymphoria', at IISER Pune which provides an opportunity for students and researchers to showcase their work, engage in interdisciplinary discussions, and gain insights from renowned speakers. In addition to the conference, we host a range of academic and social events, including Freshers' Meets, Farewell Ceremonies, and various other departmental activities that strengthen our community bonds. Whether you are an aspiring chemist or a seasoned researcher, the ChemPhilic Team offers a wealth of opportunities for professional development, networking, and forging lasting connections.
